{"id":1123439478,"question_id":2816,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1702994422,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1123439478/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Lexicographically Smallest Palindrome","memory":"44.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String makeSmallestPalindrome(String s) {\n        \n        char[] sA = s.toCharArray(); \n        int l = 0;\n        int u = s.length()-1;\n\n        while (l < u)\n        {\n            sA[l] = sA[u] = (char) Math.min(sA[l], sA[u]);\n            l++;\n            u--;\n        }\n\n        return new String(sA);\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"lexicographically-smallest-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
